ComicInfo.Title: Collars & Cuffs; Crash Bunny; Don & Kat; The Pound
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hot Pursuit: A pair of thieves engage in intercourse while escaping the police on a speeding anti-gravity bike.
Poofs Atta Pool: Don is humiliated at the swimming pool.
The Necklace: Skyler says good-bye to Galen, who is transferring to a different jurisdiction. Meanwhile, a bitter ex-con sets up an ambush for her.
Crash Bunny Vs. Frubinox The Invader: Invading aliens will call off their enslavement of Earth if a buxom retired super-heroine has sex with them - - all of them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:45. [Issue ID 200786]
